attributes.action: not listen to any advice or recommendations  regarding Motorcycles from ignorant or biased so called experts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many so called transport polict experts, such as Sephen Plowden seem to not only be ignorant of motorcycles but also to be actively biased against them. Their advice regarding motorcycles should therefore be ignored by all government departments and agencies.
